original: @ga   @#/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad🔽la bstod pa zhes bya ba/
analyzed: @ga   @#/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa zhes bya ba/
translated: Praise of All the Tathāgatas🔽Praise of All the Tathāgatas

original: / @/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa bzhugs so//_@##/_/rgya gar🔽skad du/_sarba ta tha ga sta ba na ma/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa🔽thams cad la bstod pa zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

translated: In the language of India: Sarva-tathāgata-stava🔽In the Tibetan language: Praise of All the Tathāgatas🔽Homage and bow to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas!

original: thams cad la phyag 'tshhal zhing 'dud do/_/bstan pa 'gro ba gsum gyis mchod
analyzed: thams cad la phyag 'tshhal zhing 'dud do/_/bstan pa 'gro ba gsum gyis mchod
translated: The teachings are worshipped by the three worlds,

original: gyur cing /_/phun tshhogs gzhan gyi don la ci yang mkhas/_/nyon mongs lto
analyzed: gyur cing /_/phun tshhogs gzhan gyi don la ci yang mkhas/_/nyon mongs lto
translated: and they are skilled in all that is excellent for the benefit of others.🔽I pay homage and bow to the tathāgatas,

original: 'phye chen po drung 'byin pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshhal 'dud//
analyzed: 'phye chen po drung 'byin pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshhal 'dud//
translated: who remove the great demon of afflictions.

original: zag pa bag chags thams cad rab tu spangs/_/sems can don du de nyid dri
analyzed: zag pa bag chags thams cad rab tu spangs/_/sems can don du de nyid dri
translated: Having completely abandoned all contaminations and habitual tendencies,

original: med ston/_/skye dgu thams cad gdon par brtshon pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs
analyzed: med ston/_/skye dgu thams cad gdon par brtshon pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs
translated: they teach the stainless suchness for the benefit of sentient beings.🔽I pay homage and bow to the tathāgatas,🔽who are dedicated to liberating all beings.

original: pa rnams la phyag 'tshhal 'dud/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshho chen po rgal gyur cig_/
analyzed: pa rnams la phyag 'tshhal 'dud/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshho chen po rgal gyur cig_/
translated: I pay homage to the tathagatas, who uproot the vines of craving,

original: sred pa'i 'khri shing drung nas 'byin la brtshon/_/rga dang na dang 'chi ba nyams🔽mdzad pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dam chos rin
analyzed: sred pa'i 'khri shing drung nas 'byin la brtshon/_/rga dang na dang 'chi ba nyams mdzad pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dam chos rin
translated: who destroy old age, sickness, and death,🔽and who are the source of the precious, sublime Dharma.

original: chen 'byung gnas snod gyur la/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam gyi mchog ston pas/_/🔽thams cad du ni bsam pa rdzogs mdzad pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
analyzed: chen 'byung gnas snod gyur la/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam gyi mchog ston pas/_/ thams cad du ni bsam pa rdzogs mdzad pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
translated: I pay homage to the tathagatas, who reveal the supreme path to nirvana🔽and fulfill all wishes.

original: phyag 'tshhal lo/_/sems can don gyi bsam pa rdzogs mdzad cing /_/gdul bya
analyzed: phyag 'tshhal lo/_/sems can don gyi bsam pa rdzogs mdzad cing /_/gdul bya
translated: I pay homage to the tathagatas, who fulfill the wishes for the benefit of sentient beings,🔽who awaken the lotus of disciples,

original: pad+ma'i 'byung gnas sad par mdzad/_/yon tan 'byung gnas slob ma mchog
analyzed: pad+ma'i 'byung gnas sad par mdzad/_/yon tan 'byung gnas slob ma mchog
translated: who are the source of qualities, and who cross the ocean of disciples.🔽I pay homage to the tathagatas, who are adorned with the light of the Dharma,

original: las rgal/_/de bzhin mtha' yas bskal par bsags pa'i bstan pa la/_/
analyzed: las rgal/_/de bzhin mtha' yas bskal par bsags pa'i bstan pa la/_/
translated: which is the accumulation of virtue for limitless eons,

analyzed: tshhang dbang drag po sogs kyis phyag byas shing /_/'dom gang 'od kyis brgyan
translated: and who are revered by Indra, Brahma, and the rest.

translated: Homage to the Tathāgatas,🔽who have destroyed all bad logicians,🔽who have burned the fuel of stains with the fire of wisdom,🔽and who have perfected the pledge of wisdom.🔽
